item.title: No one cares if you roll in on time anymore, but here are the behaviors co-workers do mind
item.description: Depending on sector, emphasis on punctuality has waned as remote work has thrived.

item.title: Medtronic taps Renault’s CFO to be its new finance chief. How his unusual career path helped land the job
item.description: Thierry Piéton will end his CFO tenure at French automaker Renault Group on Feb. 28.

item.title: Exclusive: Cribl, data infrastructure startup, crosses $200 million in annual recurring revenue
item.description: Cribl, a GV-backed data infrastructure startup, has hit $200 million in annual recurring revenue, the company tells Fortune.
